SharpSpring | Full Time | Software Engineer or SRE | Gainesville, FL or Atlanta, GA (REMOTE work in ATL) | https://sharpspring.com | 70K-110K DOE SharpSpring is a marketing automation company that helps our customers engage with their contacts. The term "marketing automation" encompasses lots of functionality but it really boils down to different pieces of software all working together to help our customers (email editor, CRM, sales monitoring, site tracking/analytics, landing page editor, forms, email delivery). We are working on building an amazing team (currently at 150 people) with a main office in downtown Gainesville, FL. There is lots of challenging work ahead here as we grow, scale and overcome new challenges ahead. We have a good mix of autonomy and teamwork with a candid/friendly culture.

Just some of the things you'd get to work with here: React, Golang, PHP, Docker + Kubernetes on Google Cloud Platform, Redis, MongoDB and MySQL.

Apply at https://careers.sharpspring.com/careers-list/ or send your resume to careers at sharpspring.com
